title: Perfect Boyfriend Less Than Perfect Credit
itunes:title: Perfect Boyfriend Less Than Perfect Credit
description:
Steve and Shirley, First let me clarify the title. I am a girlfriend and I'm the one with less than perfect credit. I met a man last year, who appeared in my life just two weeks after I got down on my knees and prayed....

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
